values:
FRIENDS ONLY
DO: - Add me first and drop a comment. If you don't do both, you won't be added. - Have at least three interests in common with me. - Take a general interest in my life by commenting on one in three entries. - Type like a literate human. Using exessive puntucation, constant abbreviations, etc, are a good way to make me irritated. DON'T: - Update a million times a day with no point. Excellent way to get ZERO comments back from me. - Be a comment whore. Only comment if you actually have something to contribute. To me, being friends is a mutual thing. Leave comments on mine and I'll leave comments on yours. I hope we can get to know each other! ^^
